description:
Population Raster Tuvalu 2020

Data Input: Household locations from 2017 Population and Housing Census conducted using Survey Solutions CAPI by Tuvalu Central Statistics Division. 
Year Population Growth Rate of 0.04% has been applied to update population up to 2020

Household locations vector layer has been transformed into a 100m resolution raster.
name: Tuvalu_Population_Grid_2020
